ADOdb

Database Abstraction Layer for PHP

Supported Databases

  1. Full support
    • IBM DB2
    • Microsoft SQL Server
    • MySQL
    • Oracle
    • PostgreSQL
    • SQLite Database
  2. Partial support
    • Firebird & Interbase
    • LDAP
    • Microsoft Access
    • ODBC
    • PDO
    • PDO (new)
  3. Obsolete/Unsupported Drivers
project:user_base

The ADOdb User Base

Some Projects Using ADOdb

Name Description
Zikula OpenSource PHP Application Framework
phpWiki Wiki software written in PHP
PHP GACL A Drop in Access Control System for web applications
TikiWiki Wiki software written in PHP
eGroupWare Commercial GroupWare
MantisBT Popular open-source issue tracker
phpGrid A commercial PHP DataGrid product
Some older projects
ACID Analysis Console for Intrusion Databases
Mambo A Content Management System

If your project uses ADOdb, let us know, we'll add you to the list
